name: tumblr - Time Date Stamp
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. This style displays the time/date the post was posted while hovering over the message body. When hovering the time/date stamp, the text will highlight, allowing you to click through to follow the link to the actual post. The dog-eared corner has been removed and a text highlight added to indicate a view page hover. The hover area has been extended to the middle of the top of each post. Enjoy!
additional_info:
Feedback is welcome. NOTE: This style should be applied AFTER any current desktop styles to avoid "cross interference". May not function well with styles that manipulate dashboard dimensions. BEFORE/AFTER pics are displayed here (top - current/bottom - with style applied).
09-20-2011 - Modified display field to accommodate longer date strings.
